name: Arena of Chaos
description:
Welcome to the Arena! Hot Dogs are 1$ ea. Watch these helpless convi.. crash dummies try to survive THE MOST grueling challenges! "What if they stay in one spot for too long?" - You may ask! WE PUMPED THEM FULL OF TOXINS!! - if they don't collect antidotes every few seconds - THEY DIE!! EXTREEME!!!

  • THEY PRESS AWSD TO MOVE
  • AND SHIFT TO DASH FORWARD TO AVOID DAMAGE

Credits:

Programming: Tomas, Matas, Adas
3D: Paulius, Domantas, Simas
Idea: Paulius
